parameters.name: attachResourceType
parameters.description:
The resource attachment type.

- HttpApi: HttpApi.
- Operation: Operation of HttpApi.
- GatewayRoute: Gateway route.
- GatewayService: Gateway service.
- GatewayServicePort: Gateway service port.
- Domain: Gateway domain.
- Gateway: Gateway.

parameters.name: gatewayId
parameters.description: The gateway instance ID for filtering.

parameters.name: gatewayType
parameters.description: The instance type. Valid values: **AI** and **API**.

parameters.name: includeBuiltinAiGateway
parameters.description: Specifies whether to include built-in AI plug-ins in the returned results. Default: false.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: The page number to return. Pages start from 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: pluginClassId
parameters.description: The plug-in type ID for filtering.

parameters.name: pluginClassName
parameters.description: The plug-in type name for filtering.

parameters.name: withAttachmentInfo
parameters.description: Specifies whether the returned results should include plug-in attachment information corresponding to the attachResourceId.
